items.subtitle: Reviewed in Germany on 29 September 2023
items.title: Apple eben - sehr gut!
items.review_text: War ein Geschenk - beschenkte Person ist happy. Funktioniert alles einwandfrei!

items.subtitle: Reviewed in Germany on 13 September 2023
items.title: Top Geröt. Alles absolut neuwertig
items.review_text: Das Telefon ist absolut neuwertig. Funktioniert weinwandfrei. TOp 1******

items.subtitle: Reviewed in Germany on 15 May 2023
items.title: Fast perfekter Zustand
items.review_text: Benutze das Handy nun seit einigen Monaten. Der Akuuzustand betrug 90%. Nur leider ist die Kamera nicht ganz in einwandfreien Zustand. Es macht gelbliche Bilder :/ aber ansonsten war es günstig und somit ein Schnäppchen es gebraucht über Amazon zu kaufen

items.subtitle: Reviewed in Germany on 7 August 2023
items.title: Lange Lieferung Produkt in beschriebenen Zustand
items.review_text: Die Lieferung hat sehr lange gedauert, wofür der Verkäufer aber nichts konnte da UPS da die Fehler gemacht hat. Ansonsten ist das Produkt wie beschrieben. Verkäufer ist zu empfehlen.

items.subtitle: Reviewed in Germany on 28 August 2023
items.title: Ich habe eine Bildschirmmeldung beim iPhone 12 und es funktioniert nicht regelmäßig
items.review_text: Ich habe das iPhone 12 bei Amazon gekauft. Ich bin nicht zufrieden. Es gab Bildschirminformationen. Es hat funktioniert, als es ankam. Nach einer Stunde funktionierte der Bildschirm nicht mehr. Ich habe die Person kontaktiert, die es verkauft hat. Ich werde es hier machen lassen. Ich sagte, ich möchte keine Zeit verschwenden und mir das Reparaturgeld schicken. Ich habe das nicht akzeptiert. Ich habe auch den Bildschirm reparieren lassen. Ich habe 200 Euro für die Reparatur bezahlt. Deshalb habe ich eine schlechte Bewertung abgegeben.

items.subtitle: Reviewed in Germany on 30 January 2023
items.title: Just like new
items.review_text: The phone has no scratches, 90% battery, looks brand new

items.subtitle: Reviewed in Germany on 26 December 2022
items.title: Bin sehr zufrieden
items.review_text: Bilder gestochen scharf 👍

items.subtitle: Reviewed in Germany on 29 September 2023
items.title: Habe es bereits zwei Jahre
items.review_text: Ich nutze das Handy seit zwei Jahren und bin immer noch total begeistert. Die Farbe ist auch einfach der Knüller :-)

items.subtitle: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 12 October 2023
items.title: Great phone
items.review_text: The quality is great except for I can only use my phone on loudspeaker for a phone call because the top speaker doesn’t work properly, it’s extremely quiet, but the loudspeaker works fine and everything else works perfectly

items.subtitle: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 16 October 2023
items.title: Phone works really well.
items.review_text: Bought this renewed phone about four months ago. Did not want to write a review until I had used it for quite a while to make sure it continued to work well, and it has! four months on and absolutely no problem with it. Well pleased, and reasonably priced as well.

items.subtitle: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 7 October 2023
items.title: Immaculate look 86% battery health
items.review_text: Overall I am very pleased, the phone looks and works like new, I would not mind a bit higher battery health which is 86% but it is not that bad.

items.subtitle: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 19 October 2023
items.title: Outstanding
items.review_text: As like brand new,no marks or any signs of use and battery was 100% very pleased:)

items.subtitle: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 1 September 2023
items.title: Function of the iPhone
items.review_text: It’s absolutely in a good condition and works well! Battery life could be a little improved!!! No scratches and has a great value for money!

items.subtitle: Reviewed in Spain on 31 May 2023
items.title: No está mal
items.review_text:
El teléfono se ha comprado con condición excelente, llegó bien, con la salud de la batería al 86, tiene alrededor de la pantalla pequeñas muescas casi inapreciables, caja abierta y teléfono dentro de la caja sin ninguna protección.
Poniendo el número de serie en la web de Apple te sale la fecha de la primera activación y en este caso te dice que te pongas en contacto con Apple para saberlo
Es inevitable compararlo con otro que pedí a otro vendedor con la misma condición excelente, el cual llegó en una caja precintada el teléfono con plásticos protectores Salud de batería al 100 y sin marca de uso, y en este caso poniendo el número de serie en la misma web que el anterior sale perfectamente la fecha de activación.
El resumen de todo es que no lo he devuelto ya que es un regalo y a la persona que se lo he dado le ha encantado.
En lo personal compraría en otro vendedor

items.subtitle: Reviewed in Italy on 30 September 2023
items.title: Pari al nuovo
items.review_text: Aspetto pari al nuovo, sul funzionamento per ora tutto perfetto.... tempi di consegna molto più brevi di quelli indicati....

items.subtitle: Reviewed in France on 10 August 2023

items.subtitle: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 21 September 2023
items.title: Very nice

items.subtitle: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 13 June 2023
items.title: Almost good as new
items.review_text: Aesthetically and functionally, behaves like a brand new phone. Only reason im giving it 4 stars is due to a minor scratch/chip at the circle surrounding the top camera.

items.subtitle: Reviewed in Italy on 16 September 2023
items.title: Buon telefono
items.review_text: Il telefono è arrivato esteticamente perfetto con il 92% di batteria, il sistema funziona bene, ci sono (ogni tanto) alcuni bug.

items.subtitle: Reviewed in France on 28 July 2023
items.title: Très bien
items.review_text: En excellent état batterie à 100 % aucune fissure vraiment comme neuf !

items.subtitle: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 7 February 2023
items.title: damage / dirt
items.review_text:
I've bought 3 pre-owned from Amazon over the last few years.  This is the first phone that has visible damage to the corner.  The screen and back are free of scratches.
The phone also had dirt build up from the previous user's case.  The dirt is around the charging port and the button to turn the sound on/off.
I understand the damage to the top corner, it is second hand so can't expect no damage at all.  But I am disappointed that they couldn't have cleaned the dirt off the phone.  I'm wondering whether it's refurbished at all or they just reset the phone and box it for shipping?
The other disappointing thing is, I thought it would come with a USB-C charger like all the IPhone 12's do and it didn't.  It's just a regular charging cable, so now I will have to purchase one.
I'm still to test it out fully, as will need to check the call quality etc.  Overall the phone looks good, I'm just really disappointed that it wasn't cleaned properly.

items.subtitle: Reviewed in Italy on 29 August 2023
items.title: Bello e come nuovo
items.review_text: Sembra un telefono nuovo di pacca! Peccato di non ricevere anche la scatola originale!

items.subtitle: Reviewed in Spain on 11 August 2023
items.title: Vale la pena

items.subtitle: Reviewed in Italy on 16 October 2023

items.review_text: Telefono arrivato nei tempi previsti, praticamente nuovo, funziona perfettamente ed è uno spettacolo per una persona come me che nn ha mai avuto un iPhone… più che soddisfatta😊😊

items.subtitle: Reviewed in Italy on 28 October 2023
items.title: Prodotto perfetto
items.review_text: Prodotto perfetto come da descrizione per acquisto, arrivato in perfette condizioni e nel tempo promesso.

items.subtitle: Reviewed in Spain on 23 June 2023
items.title: iPhone 12 128 Gb- casi perfecto
items.review_text: Era un móvil de segunda mano, llevaba un pequeño golpe en un lateral y la batería al 85%, lo devolví pues era muy caro a mi parecer para dentro de un año tener que cambiarle la batería y del golpe no me fiè.

items.review_text: Bien

items.subtitle: Reviewed in France on 29 December 2022
items.title: Bon achat, conforme aux attentes mais pas parfait
items.review_text: Cetais pour offrir et je suis plutôt satisfait de mon achat malgré une légère rayure sur le bas ( a peine visible) et une autonomie de batterie pas au top (80%) sinon tout fonctionne pour le moment.
